events.message: We have received the applicant's resume and cover letter for the Software Engineer position yesterday morning.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department accordingly.
A recruiter specializing in software developer roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's process.
The candidate completed the initial phone screening and demonstrated a solid understanding of relevant software engineering concepts.
Received enthusiastic confirmation from the candidate to proceed with the next round of interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next Thursday at 2 PM via video conference.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been arranged with the candidate for Wednesday at 11 AM to assess cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview went well; the candidate expressed strong motivation and alignment with the company values.
A formal job offer has been extended to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits package.
Received positive feedback from the candidate, who appreciated the offer details and is considering the proposal carefully.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer and is excited to join the Engineering team.
The new engineer started the onboarding process smoothly, completing all initial paperwork and training modules.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the software development team.
